name: Fitness World
address: Fitness World, 447 Interurban Wy, Vancouver, BC V5X 0C7

detailed_reviews.review_text: The gym is fantastic, with a well-equipped facility and a welcoming atmosphere that makes working out enjoyable. Its the perfect place to achieve your fitness goals, My PT Gustavo was amazing! Hes incredibly friendly and approachable, making every session very effective., knows the ins and outs of fitness, and is always flexible with my workout schedule. His motivation keeps me going strong. highly recommended!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi J Ajex Jais, This review made our day! It s always great to hear how we re able to support our members in accomplishing their goals, and helping them in their fitness journey! I know Gustavo takes pride in his work and is passionate about getting his clients results! Thank you again for the kind review!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The employees here are great! Nice equipment and very well put together. Lucas, Sam, gopi and naas where really helpful and kind getting me started on my fitness journey, I really recommend trying out the gym! 10/10.

Great gym with great space and amazing trainers. I had Sam at the beginning and Gustavo towards the end as Personal Trainers. Sam was amazing with planning the diet and more athletic workouts. Gustavo towards the last few sessions and it was ROCK ON. He pushes you to the limits to a reach your goal and stay on top of you and I am seeing results already. PUMPING THE IRON.

Honestly this gym is so unbelievably welcoming I have a hard time being consistent with the gym but I recently started going here and the trainers here are top notch amazing.  Lucas and Shush usually manning the front door are helpful as hell and super dope guys.  Sarah and Sam are also so genuine and always happy to see you. A month ago my body looked a whole lot different and honestly having a nice smile and genuine staff that are happy and excited for you to reach your goals really helps me to always come back. It s a 10/10 gym.

Honestly, the gym is as good as any other place. You can get premium gym membership at other places but the equipment will still be the same. The treadmills, weights, and squat racks are going to be manufactured by the same small handful of companies anyways. The draw back to this gym is as other reviews mentioned, overcrowding. If you logically think about it this location in comparison to other fitness worlds is positioned at the most lucrative spot. A transit and sky train intersection. It is an inevitability that there will be more people at this gym than other places. Once you do the cost benefit analysis, it s not all that surprising. The solution is simply to ask other people to swap in with you during workouts. Most are quite friendly thus not decline and once you get into the habit of this, your gym routine will be on schedule as usual in my personal experience. No delays.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi John, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been going to the gym for a while now and have been using personal trainers on and off and although most were helpful I didn t feel the connection. When I started going to Fitness World, I was assigned to Nicole and have been working with her for about 2-3 months now. She has been amazing in terms of actually paying attention to your progress, performance and well being and has always done more than what s expected of her to make sure I am happy with my experience. I can see huge progress in myself under her instructions and she has helped me significantly improve how I workout. Thank you Nicole!

I really love this place. I come here with my friends and just enjoy the amount of machines available and space. I recommend to go in in the early hours ie: 5 or 6 am. After 4pm youre in for chaos but if youre into that, you do you! Also, personal trainers are a whole new level. Gustavo Chivata was just an amazing trainer. He taught me good posture, breathing rythm, pacing myself, pairing machines with other workouts, and he was just so approachable. I really recommend the free session and I also took the 5 sessions, trust me it does make a difference. Gus was a breeze to work with and also spoke Spanish, which was a plus to me.

This great gym, walking in everyone is very welcoming. The staff is helpful and generous to help with any of your needs. Kelly was super friendly and helped me with my membership and Lucas was patient and answered any questions I had. Definitely recommend this place.
Nice spacious facility. Lots of weight and equipment. Great gym for anybody who transits or lives in the area!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tegan, We appreciate the awesome pictures! We love hearing from our members. We are so glad you love our facility and appreciate you for being a member! Thanks again for such an awesome review!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently started working out, and figured that having a trainer for some sessions would be a good way to build my fundamentals for lifting. My trainer Martin was the absolute best, as he was super patient and offered lots of advice not just for lifting, but for my diet as well. He had no issues answering any questions that I had, and went super in-depth on all topics. I really recommend Martin to anyone starting off at the gym and looking for a trainer.

It is the first time that I am going to a gym and my trainer Kateryna is very welcoming and considerate. She is quite motivating and has helped in detailing personalized plans and helping me in implementing the same. The gym environment is great and location is good.

Amazing facility and workers, this gym has everything to maximize a workout. The staff go above and beyond to make the experience great, especially kym. She greets everyone with a positive attitude/smile and is willing to help anyone with whatever issue they have. She works hard to ensure everyone who uses this facility enters and leaves happy after their workout. She treats every member equally and never puts one person over the next, she helps anyone and everyone she can.
It has a very good workout atmosphere. starting your day at 5am, you are not alone. Stephanie is very friendly and helpful. Shes been giving me the best support youd expect from a gym
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi there, Thanks for the review! It s always great to hear how we re able to support our members in accomplishing their goals, and helping them in their fitness journey! Have a great day!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve been working out for little over a year now at Fitness World Marine Drive and it s been a great experience so far. The gym is well maintained and clean. The staff are friendly, experienced and supportive. Stephanie at the front desk has the kindest disposition and has always been incredibly helpful with all inquiries. It s great to see a lovely smile greet you first thing in the morning!

This is a fantastic gym!! My trainer Nicole is super nice and is very accommodating to my fitness level. She has taught me a lot of little tips and tricks that have just enhanced my training overall. I ve been training with Nicole for only a little bit and am already seeing big changes in my energy levels and body. Highly recommend her!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tahina, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Nicole works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Gopi

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fitness World Marine Gateway is a top-notch gym that offers a wide range of equipment and amenities that cater to all fitness levels. The staff is always available to assist with any questions or concerns. The front desk representative, Stephanie, is a true gem. She greets everyone with a friendly smile and a positive attitude, making you feel welcomed from the moment you walk in the door. Whether youre a seasoned gym-goer or a beginner, Stephanie and the rest of the staff will ensure that your experience at Fitness World Marine Gateway is nothing short of exceptional. Overall, I highly recommend this gym to anyone looking for a well-priced, top-quality fitness facility with outstanding staff and amenities.

Highly recommend getting massage sessions with Ryan Brown. I have been off training for over 12 weeks now due to a knee issue. I have only had 3 massages therapy sessions with Ryan and I am already moving in ways I have not been able to in these 12 plus weeks. Truly looking forward to get back into my training full speed! Thank you Ryan!

Martin is a very meticulous and dedicated trainer. He is very dedicated to ensure that your goals are met and is very encouraging! He constructs effective routines and gives fantastic suggestions to improve on your existing habits. Started and im definitely seeing results! Definitely recommend training together with him

Fitness World is a fantastic place to achieve your fitness goals. From the selection of great equipments to the knowledgeable and friendly staff, this gym has everything you need to get in shape. However, my experience was taken to the next level thanks to my personal trainer, Kym. She was attentive, motivational, and had a wealth of knowledge when it came to exercise and nutrition. She created personalized workout plans that pushed me to my limits while also making sure I stayed safe and injury-free. Kym made my gym experience unforgettable, and I highly recommend her to anyone looking to get fit at Fitness World.

Had an awesome first fitness session with Mooney. Was a bit nervous going in not really knowing anything about the gym or what to really do but, he was very patient and welcoming and was happy to answer any questions I had. Looking forward to finishing off my training sessions with him

Big thanks to Gopi and the Fitness World team for allowing me to try out their facilities to see if it was best suited for me. They have tons of equipment and are very reasonably priced! I decided to join on the  goal  membership so I can drag my boyfriend in for workouts with me!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Surena, Your review made our day! Thank you for such kind words. We are elated that you are content with our facilities and that you are bringing in your boyfriend for workouts as well! Hope to see you in the gym again soon! - Gopi

detailed_reviews.review_text: Absolutely love going to this gym! Particularly enjoy personal training with my trainer, Kateryna. She knows how to push and motivate you and allows you to be a better version of yourself. She s helped me to achieve my goals and also helps me to consistently work out with the right technique and mindsets. Highly recommend getting training sessions from her!

Fitness world is the perfect gym during all the year, the staff helps you every time you need it. They offer a lot of options, the personal trainer are really good. I had an amazing experience with Kateryna, she taught me a lot of things and I m feeling a lot better with my self now. I recommend it!

I started my online training with Nicole two years ago now and , despite being on the other side of the country , I couldnt be happier with my experience so far. Nicole is an exceptional personal trainer who is dedicated, knowledgeable, and always pushes me to my limits in a supportive and motivating way. She takes the time to understand my fitness goals and tailors each session to my needs, making sure that I get the most out of every workout. With her guidance, I have been able to make significant progress towards my fitness goals, and I feel stronger, more confident, and more energized than ever before. Nicole is also an excellent communicator and makes sure that I understand the rationale behind each exercise and the benefits it brings to my overall fitness. She has a wealth of knowledge and experience, and I always feel like Im learning something new and valuable during my workouts. Overall, I would highly recommend Nicole as a personal trainer to anyone looking to improve their fitness and overall well-being. She is a true professional who cares deeply about her clients and goes above and beyond to help them achieve their goals. Whether you live close by or from a far. Thank you, Nicole!

I randomly walked into the gym while walking across Marine Drive, looking at a gym membership that would best fit my comfort. This one was perfect and Mr. Vipul at the front desk is one the best staff members on board, he made the processes of signing up easy and quick.

name: Gold's Gym West Broadway
address: Gold's Gym West Broadway, 709 W Broadway, Vancouver, BC V5Z 1J5

detailed_reviews.review_text: Right as I walked in I was treated with a warm smile and ready for them to help me. I walked in for just a day pass and they took care of it right away. Erika gave me a tour of the facility, very professional and good listener. Overall great facility and equipment. 10/10
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Roberto. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there s anything we can help you with, please don t hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is a great gym. The staff is very friendly and approachable if you have any questions and feedback on equipment etc. I would give this gym 4.5 stars only because they are missing a few key pieces of equipment but that s only if your the body builder kinda guy. But I did talk to them and they are planning on adding those pieces in the next couple years which is why I gave the 5 stars. One is the pendulum squat machine which is one of the best machines to add on your leg day to really focus on the quads better than any workout you can think of for the quads. The pendulum squat machine is very difficult to find in any gym so the fact that they re adding it is amazing. Another is a standing lateral raise machine, Some call it a Watson machine. Another is the standing T Bar Row, they do have the seated one, but it doesn t put you at the best angle but still workable. All in all a great gym if you can avoid the busy hours. Thank you Golds!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Daniel. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there s anything we can help you with, please don t hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was in Vancouver for a week last month and signed up for a weekly membership at Gold s. Their team was very friendly and it was a fantastic experience. I used the facility daily and had excellent workouts. They have some great equipment, a wide range of free weights and lots of machines. Highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Richard. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Wonderful gym. Our staff worked there during the renovation and seen the highest quality equipment being placed and we decided to get memberships there and workout. Amazing facilities and the best value in the area. Great family owned franchise with happy positive staff.

the best gym round!!! and even better staff and members. Everyone  is so generously kind and supportive. From being a beginner starting out to trainers who have been training for decades. If every gym was like golds, no one would be home, but at the gym 24/7
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Dithni. We re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Your review made our day. Our team works very hard to keep our members happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you! We hope we can keep assisting in the process of reaching your fitness goals. Thank you, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love this gym! Facilities are well kept and theres plenty of equipment to work out on. Havent been in a bit but my go to recommendation to other people.
Staff are very approachable; gym cleanliness is well-maintained. Space is enough to do your workouts, never felt like its cramped even on busy hours.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Allana. Thank you so much for the review!  We are so happy to be a part of your Journey!~ Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Capacious, cool staff, dope machines, mindful clientele, thoughtful layout, well ventilated.. day pass well worth it.  Bring a towel n good to go.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Mark. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Really good gym with good equiptment. The staff are all lovely and friendly. Ive been at this gym 6 months and have had no problems at all. I also had personal training with Gordon, great trainer with a wealth of knowledge. Really helped me understand different ways to train and hit my goals. Super encouraging and motivating. Great PT.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Chloe. Thanks for the review! We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive fitness experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Kindly, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I checked out several gyms in the area and this one met all my needs. Clean, great equipment and lots of it. Many different areas to work out in. Friendly and helpful staff. I highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Kathrin. We are so happy you had a great experience with us. Thank you for taking the time to rate us! - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Haven t been here long, but really loving it so far :) everyone is super nice (members and staff alike), and I m really enjoying being part of the Gold s community.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Joy. We are so happy you had a great experience with us. Thank you for taking the time to rate us! - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fantastic gym the girl who gave me the tour was knowledgeable kind and friendly. There definitely could be some more chest fly machines but overall a really good gym and environment. Will definitely be back.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Jared. We re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. Your review made our day. Our team works very hard to keep our members happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you! We hope we can keep assisting in the process of reaching your fitness goals. Thank you, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great facility with friendly staff! Whether you are utilizing purely the gym or also taking any of the fitness classes (from Yoga, to Pilates, Spin to Zumba classes) that are offered you feel part of the Gold s Family and I have been a member for less than 2 weeks! Highly recommend taking one of Gemma s classes! And for those days you want to be alone, ladies, there s a ladies only section. Fthose on a budget, it is clear you really get the most bang for your buck out of this gym! It s really an all-in-one membership! The only thing I regret is not signing up sooner! Thanks Gold s Gym Broadway!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Maria. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Your Golds Gym West Broadway Family.

detailed_reviews.review_text: What prompted me to write this review is the fact that they noticed that I havent signed in to the gym for over 2 months and decided to reach out to see if I was okay and that if I wanted to I could pause my membership. Usually gyms are cash grabs where they oversell memberships and hope people dont show up but I really appreciated this gesture. Gym itself is usually great and not too busy during the weekdays. Has everything you need in a gym and is affordable.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Robert! We cant wait to see you back in the gym soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: All the equipment and gym facilities are clean and great! I love all of their energetic group classes trainers :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Yejin, Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at Golds Gym West Broadway! We are thrilled to hear that you found our equipment and gym facilities to be an elevated level of clean. Our energetic group class trainers work hard to create a motivating and enjoyable environment for our members! Thank you! Golds Gym West Broadway team

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very positive experience with Kirat from this location. He was very welcoming and professional throughout the whole membership on-boarding process.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Tra. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: As someone who had never worked out at the gym before, I was quite intimidated to get started! After 3 months of personal training with Bel, I am now confident in using the equipment and absolutely loving my new exercise routine (something I never would have thought I would say even 4 months ago!). Bel was such a patient, caring, and highly knowledgeable trainer. She helped me grow my confidence and skills to the point where I am now working out 4x a week and following my own custom plan which she created for me. I cannot recommend Bel and Gold s Gym enough!

Very queer friendly and inclusive gym represented by both staff and members. Nice and  Clean gym. Staff is walking around helping to put things away. When things are broken they are fixed in a timely fashion. I am always greeted by the  Friendly staff. Sam the GM is very helpful and friendly. Just wish it was bigger but maybe one day they will expand up stairs!  and maybe a dt location!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Riley! Thank you so much for your feedback! We will be sure to let her know! We love having you part of our community! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: That is a good place to have your workout done! Everyone is nice and polite. The equipments and structure are great!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Kianne. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The best equipment in Vancouver, the staff is great, and the facility is always clean. Couldn t find a thing to fault!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Kirat! Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best Club downtown. Awesome Technogym equipment. CLEAN! Their Covid-19 cleaning standards are above and beyond. Putting forward their best interests in safety for their valued members. Friendly and welcoming staff. Sense of belonging to the club. Finally a downtown gym with some etiquette. Members put their weights away. Respectful environment. Equipment well laid out for spacing/social distancing. 1hr 45min free parking. Added crossfit sections. Lots of cardio machines! Huge big screens to catch up on your fave Sports between sets. A gym environment where you truly feel the value of health and fitness!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Dean! Thank you so much for the positive feedback! You are one of our loyal and valued members and we are so grateful you and the whole family are part of our Golds Gym community! We really do appreciate all of you! See you soon! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Compared to other gyms, I find the staff at this gym quite cooperative and helpful. The gym is quite clean and the equipments are in good condition.

First thing I noticed during my time at Golds gym is the large variety of equipment available to the public, as well as the amount of weights available for use (Not the free weight though). The layout of the gym floor is efficiently setup so that no corners are left unused. Couldn t have been more impressed with the service and my time here without help from Jessica as well. If they keep up the sales here I ll definitely get my friends to come along soon!

So I will start with the negative stuff: -most of the times free weights area can get crowded ( the good news is its not the whole day) I do think the gym management can re arrange the the gym in a better way to separate the free weights area from the machines area, the gym has plenty of empty space this will results in a less dense area) - The weights are annoying to put on and off easily into the bar (on the good side it wont be lose when you are bench pressing :)) -The changing room/locker area doesnt smell nice it doesnt smell bad either just no fresh air I guess ( install better ventilation plz) Now to the good stuff : -Nice friendly management and staff -The gym is always cleaned by someone all the time -New equipments and machines the best I think at least for all the gym I have been to all my life- 7 gyms total - -running machines treadmills has no TV! -location is great bus stop in front of the gym and there is parking underground as well I will update this review every few months
Nice gym , nice staff , would be good if there would be some shower gels or shampoo in changing room the rest is great
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your feedback, Kateryna.- Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

name: Fitness World
address: Fitness World, 555 W 12th Ave, Vancouver, BC V5Z 3X7

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive been coming to this gym for a while as a guest, and I finally ended up subscribing. They have affordable packages befitting for your goals and plenty of clean and working equipment. However, keep in mind that it is usually crowded at peak times. Staff is friendly and willing to help you, Eve (personal trainers) helped me to identify exercise posture and muscle to be trained on. She was really sweet. Overall, I find this gym functional for workout beginners and experienced people. You can monitor your progress with a personal trainer or with the equipment available.

Have been a member for >2 years, and still love it. I joined at some point in Covid and I was pretty grumpy... and this gym has helped me lose >30 pounds and make some big fitness gains. The manager (Dylan) is fantastic and relentlessly positive, and the staff is generally great. I recently experimented with some personal training with Mike and cant recommend him enough - he is super knowledgeable, patient, supportive, and knows how to push people really effectively. When I can afford training regularly, Ill try to get Mike - just a couple of professional moves away for me:) But my workouts with him were outstanding - highly highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Leanne, Youre the best. Thank you for the amazing comments. Dylan Campanaro General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been doing personal training with Sarah H. for the past month and absolutely loving the sessions! She is so thoughtful and always encourages me to push myself so I can grow. I am excited to continue working with her! I also really appreciate how approachable and welcoming all the staff are. Members are usually pretty good about working in when it s busy too. In general, I feel a lot safer in this gym than others I have been to (yay for being a woman  ) because coaches are always around training someone and keeping an eye on things.

Love this place! My Personal Trainer Julie Tran has given me all the tools and resources to target my goals and feel amazing. She has been super supportive and has made me fall in love with fitness! 100% recommend training with her!!!

This is a great gym! A wide range of equipment, lots of different spaces to work out in and everyone is really friendly. They ve got great massage chairs too. I ve been doing personal training with Jason and would highly recommend.

I have had such a wonderful experience working out at Fitness World Cambie location over the past couple years. It is an affordable gym with a decent variety of equipment. What makes this gym truly stand out are the employees. They put a smile on my face whenever I come to the gym and that is saying a lot since I usually arrive at 6am slightly sleepy and grumpy. Id like to give a big shout out to Benny. He is one of the friendliest people Ive ever met. He is very diligent, remembers everyones names and it is clear he is passionate about his job and the members of Fitness World. Although there are larger gyms in the area, the sense of community Fitness World creates in their gym is unbeatable. Thanks for making all of my workouts such a pleasant experience.

Great, affordable gym to be working out at. The staff are honestly the friendliest Ive met - especially Bennie! What a guy. I would also recommend getting a PT session from Alex. He was a fountain of knowledge, fixed issues that other PTs in previous gyms have completely missed, really pushed me as hard as I could and was super motivating the whole session. I am training for an Ironman and he was on it with the sports performance side. If I ever had any questions he was always available to message also. As cringe as it sounds, I honestly feel so much more confident and happier following only a couple of weeks working with Alex. He also helped with a nutrition plan (which has always been my weak point!). Thanks again Team! Mark

Currently been going to this gym for the past couple of months, at first was bit iffy but turned out to be great since I joined with a personal Trainer there! At first was going for once a week which was fine budget wise but after awhile turned it to two times a week and am seeing better results, like how he teaches the exercises and isn t all that harsh when it comes to pushing through and finishing the reps, going fantastic and always do look forward to the PT sessions with Mike :D

The best gym I have even been to! The team has an incredible energy. From start with Adam signing me up to working out with the best personal trainer I have ever had the chance to workout that is James. The cleanliness and energy that the staff provides that keeps me motivated to come back everyday. Thank you guys for existing and supporting me on this limited time I am spending in BC.

I signed up at Fitness World this past winter and didn t realize how much it would change my life. Feeling nervous of machines and unsure what to do I signed up for personal training. I ve been training with Sarah which has made my experience so fulfilling. She feels like my superhero sidekick. I m fully supported, helps me stay committed, educates me on the body, and has been the perfect role model to embody feminine power. My physical body keeps gaining muscle as we work on my goals. Highly recommend Fitness World and Sarah. I m able to conquer life s obstacles with my new layer of inner and outer strength.

Great gym, always have a good time when I come here. I usually just come with my friend and I get free access. Which is one of the main reasons I love it. Very clean, pleasant staff and lots of different machines and weights to use.

Jason is a fantastic trainer and really works to make your goals his goal. Bennys positive attitude is contagious. Both are a fantastic addition to the team at Cambie. The gym itself is huge and has a great amount of machines and gear, you will never be waiting for a piece of equipment.

A Hidden Gem for Fitness Enthusiasts! Ive been a member of the fitness club managed by Dylan and his exceptional team for a short while now, and I must say, its an absolute game-changer. From the moment you walk in, youre greeted with a vibe thats both invigorating and welcoming   a combination thats hard to find. Dylans commitment to running the gym is truly inspiring. Its evident that he pours his heart and soul into making this place top-notch. The club boasts some of the most cutting-edge equipment Ive ever come across, and its not just about the quantity; its about the quality that truly sets them apart. You can feel the dedication in every rep you do. Speaking of equipment, the range is mind-blowing. Whether youre a seasoned athlete or just starting your fitness journey, theres something for everyone. And lets not forget those hidden pockets of stunning street views   a visual treat that adds a refreshing touch to your workout. One thing that truly seals the deal for me is the convenience. With free parking, you dont have to stress about finding a spot before you break a sweat. And those massage equipment perks? Theyre a game-changer after an intense session   a little slice of heaven to reward yourself with. If youre still on the fence, I highly recommend giving their free trial a shot. Its the perfect opportunity to experience firsthand what sets this club apart. Trust me, you wont regret it. Dylan and his team have created a haven for fitness enthusiasts thats as cool and casual as it is intelligent and forward-thinking. This is one review Im more than delighted to write, and I know youll be just as thrilled to join this fantastic fitness community. See you at the club!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi There, I wanted to personally respond to this review and express an immense amount of gratitude towards not only the time you spent to write this review, but the kind words expressed as well. Your feelings towards our club is the exact reason why I love being in this industry and I am so thankful that we have provided a positive impact towards you. If we can ever do anything for you, please let me know as we are always here to help. Dylan Campanaro General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: My trainer G is awesome!! Helped me lose weight and gain muscle. He pushes me beyond what I thought was my limit but shows I have more inside me. HIGHLY recommend him!!

I have been having personal training sessions with G for a few months now and hes fantastic. When I originally joined the gym I hated it and had no idea what I was doing, but G invited me to a free session and I ended up signing up for sessions with him. G has helped me so much with correct technique, strength and how to put fun workouts together and I now love coming to the gym! If you want a PT I would definitely go with G, hes great to work with!

I have been coming to this gym since just before Christmas and have had the pleasure of having G as a personal trainer. I took the free session with no intention of signing up for a personal trainer, but G blew me away and I felt like all my goals could be achieved with his guidance. I was not disappointed. I had a goal of weight loss for my wedding, but also to gain strength and mobility for my own longevity and quality of life, as I have a physically demanding job. G has kept me focused and on track and I have been amazed with the results I have seen. Overall, not only have I lost weight and feel much more confident in myself, I also had no idea I could get so fit, lift so much weight, and feel so strong! G is a demanding trainer, our sessions together leave me feeling pushed to the limit and amazed at what I have achieved. If you are looking to take it easy look elsewhere. G will push you and you will see results and have a blast at the same time.  He is exceptionally enthusiastic and passionate about his work and it is infectious. He is always available for advice and guidance. I cannot recommend him highly enough and will never have another trainer, I will always train the G way! I thank him for him encouragement and belief in me.
Good facilities and friendly staff. Due to the large scale of gym, there are fewer restrictions on the use of equipment even if many people exercise at the same time.

Michael Almeida is my personal trainer and he s been nothing but amazing!  He truly cares about your goal and helps you attain it by challenging you in a way that you never thought you d be able to do.  He mixes things up so you don t get bored.  He just seems to know when to push you to the next level.  He is very attentive, friendly and supportive.  My son and I enjoy training with him.  It has only been 2 and half months and we are already seeing great results.  If you re looking to improve your fitness level, go see Mike.  I highly recommended him.

Ive been with trainer Michael Almeida for over a month and Ive had nothing but a fantastic time so far. Ive been getting numerous comments on how I look slimmer and more muscular from my friends. Hes extremely personable and fun to talk to as well, and pushes me further than I thought I was capable of. I am becoming a stronger person mentally and physically. For those of you debating regarding starting personal training as I once was - I would highly recommend it. Training with a professional showed me just how much I thought I knew but didnt actually know.

Very nice gym, at least for me as a beginner. The staff is very friendly and always gonna be there for you if you need help. Also, the gym has hydro massage lounge that is incredible good after a long workout. Don t come here after 6pm because is too busy. If you need personal trainer, you definitely should go with G, the French guy. I ve been working with him once a week and I can tell he really cares about you and your process. After a month with him, I notice important  changes in my body. Thanks you G!

Trust the reviews! Dylan, the manager, is an awesome guy   super friendly, answered all my questions and I even saw him emptying the garbage cans in the weight rooms   he clearly cares. I also find the other gym-goers respectful and kind; as a woman who doesn t always enjoy being looked at when working out, I feel comfortable here. It can be quite busy at peak times, and I prefer to workout on the turf rooftop when it s nice out. There are currently low-intensity fitness classes with a sweet, helpful instructor. Everyone wears masks in every part of the gym. Happy I joined on the  Fit  membership and after checking out another location, this place will be my go-to. Looking forward to get stronger after being far-too sedentary during Covid!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Alison, First and foremost, thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review. Your positivity and attitude in the gym has made us extremely grateful to have you as a member. As always, whatever you need, please do not hesitate to reach out and we will be here to help! Dylan Campanaro General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is my fifth month in Cambie branch and overall I would say they have more machines and space compare to other branches. I workout with Michael for my personal training sessions and he is Awesome. Michael has a wealth of knowledge when it comes to fitness and nutrition, and he was always able to provide me with helpful tips and advice on how to optimize my workouts and diet. He was also very attentive to my individual needs and preferences, and he was always able to customize my workouts to fit my fitness level and goals. One thing that really stood out to me about Michael was his dedication to helping me achieve my goals. He was always there to motivate and encourage me, and he never hesitated to push me to work harder and strive for excellence. With his guidance and support, I was able to achieve things I never thought possible.

My experience at Fitness World Cambie has been truly outstanding, all thanks to the professionalism and dedication of the General Manager, Dylan, and his team members. Their commitment to member satisfaction shines through from the warm and professional welcome at reception to the personalized attention they offer. In the past, Ive experienced gyms where personal trainers appeared to lack expertise, and there was no higher authority to turn to for assistance. Fitness World Cambie, on the other hand, is a refreshing change. The trainers at this location are not just well-informed, but also incredibly supportive and enthusiastic, creating a comfortable and motivating environment for fitness enthusiasts (or newbies) across all levels. One of the standout features of this gym is the tight-knit family vibe and the sense of community they foster. Dylans approachability and his knack for remembering everyones names contribute to this welcoming atmosphere. This location exceeds expectations when it comes to essential factors a gym should have, offering a variety of classes, well-maintained equipment, excellent hygiene and ventilation, and spotless facilities. The diverse fitness options and genuine care demonstrated by the staff make this gym the ideal choice for anyone looking to improve their health and well-being. Whats more, if theres ever an issue, a quick word with Dylan usually resolves it without any fuss. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Fitness World Cambie for its unrivaled service, comprehensive facilities, and the exceptional approachability of the General Manager and team members, all while creating a warm, family-like atmosphere and a strong sense of community.

I have been training with G for 3 months now and it has been an amazing experience, Im finally motivated to go to the gym and feel confident using the equipment. Super friendly guy and has gone above and beyond to tailor my training plans for what I need. If youre looking for a trainer I would 100% recommend going with G!

Absolutely love this location! I have been going now for almost 3 months, and seeing Kat Tuason, for personal training. Shes 100% a big reason as to why I have enjoyed this location and going to the gym. Shes always on top of everything, and ready with all needed gear as soon as I arrive for my lesson. Which in this gym is very important, as it can get busy at times. However, that is to be expected with a great place. I find going to this gym actually pretty fun most days. And really enjoy the extra perks , like the Hydro massage chairs and pressure chairs. I also love how helpful and kind the rest of the stuff are. The General manager Dylan, is awesome too. Thank you all for the great work and keep it up !

name: Fitness World
address: Fitness World, 2150 W Broadway #200, Vancouver, BC V6K 4L9

detailed_reviews.review_text: As a man who just turned 40 and has never been to a gym in his life, doing three personal trainer sessions really helped me get started and gave me the confidence to go to the gym regularly. My trainer Dylan Hunt was absolutely fantastic and always checks in on me when he sees me at the gym. This is a really busy gym but they make sure you feel a part of the community and everyone is super helpful. Big shout out to Dylan though, he made everything super easy to understand and gave me a great work out plan. I love catching up with him when I see him
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alan, We are so happy to see your feedback and glad that you enjoy your personal training sessions with Dylan! It is never too late to start weight training and taking care of your health :) This is what we take pride of as a trainer is to help our clients to achieve their fitness goals. Again, thank you for your positive comments. Enjoy your workout! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Jogpaul is an exceptional personal trainer! His dedication and expertise transformed my fitness journey, helping me reach goals I never thought possible. The results speak volumes, and I couldnt be happier with my progress. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a motivating and knowledgeable fitness partner!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Thezyth, Thank you for your positive feedback. We are extremely happy that you are seeing results with our personal trainer Jogpaul. Our personal trainer do provide a great training program with nutrition supports to help our clients to achieve their fitness goals! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Newcomer to the gym, delighted with the facilities! Great experience with PT Alex S who ran through a personal trainer session with me. Showed a great mix of technical knowledge, enthusiasm, and support that made it so enjoyable! Really happy with things
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Michael, Thank you for your review! We love hearing from our members, especially newcomers when we are able to make a positive change in your fitness experience! I know Alex S works super hard to help our members and clients to achieve your fitness goals, so Ill be sure to pass off your positive feedback to him and the team. Thanks again, Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Jogpaul is the best personal trainer out there! If you re looking to get a personal trainer, highly recommend asking for him. My goal was to put on more muscle and we did exactly that. All of our sessions were fun and challenging at the same time. Definitely made me look forward to our sessions. I would recommend him to my friends and family.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Simran, This review made our day! Its always great to hear how our personal trainer can help our members to accomplish their fitness goals! I know Jogpaul really makes a difference with his clients and provides quality service. Thank you for your support and review. Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recommend this gym - Ive been taking PT with Jogpaul for a couple of months and have only praise to share! Hes a genuine guy that wont beat around the bush - his straightforward demeanor and approach to training makes working out with him effective. Its refreshing to see a PT with real passion behind his work and it absolutely shows in what he puts on the table and the energy he brings to sessions
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ryan, Thank you for your review and we are glad that you enjoy your training sessions with Jogpaul! Passion is one of our core values in Fitness World! We do take pride of that and help our clients to success! Thanks again for your review, Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Went to the gym here, not very confident in myself for exercises and would be worried about not doing them right! Met a personal trainer there by the name of PT Alex, the experience and quality of not only his communication and understanding but showing me all the exercises was the best iv ever seen! He trained me that day to help me get a better understanding of all the workouts best for me and exactly what I should be doing! I am 100% going back and getting sessions with him and I couldn t recommend him highly enough! An absolutely gent of a lad with massive knowledge of the exercises and helping you understand your goals! Would definitely recommend anyone that wants the better themselves (regardless of confidence) ask for Alex! 10/10
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alan, This review made our day! Alex is definitely one of our great trainers that make a difference in our clients fitness goals! His clients has been seeing results since working with him. And we are glad that we are being part of your fitness journey. Have a great day, and thanks for the review! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I just worked out here for the first time and it was a great experience. The girl at the front desk (I believe her name is Sahar) was amazing and gave me a great tour of the gym. This place is pretty huge and it has more than enough equipment to accommodate for everyone. They even have massage machines and a womens only section. Check it out! I ll definitely be back next week to sign up for a membership :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Matt, Thank you for your review. We are glad that you had such a great experience on your first visit. Besides our large variety of equipment, we do have recovery tools such as hydro massage and normatic leg compression that helps a lot with muscle recovery. We are more than happy to assist you with your membership sign-up. You can call us or send me an email at GMKitsilano@fitnessworld.ca for membership sign-up appointment :) General Manager Eve

detailed_reviews.review_text: All the staff here are great and I have been especially impressed by Hazel who is so welcoming every day and creates such a comfortable, friendly environment as soon as you walk through the door! She has such a positive attitude!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rebecca, Thank you for your great review! We are glad that hear our front desk staff Hazel make such a positive influence to you. Our staffs take pride of helping our members. Welcome to our club any day and time! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Dylan is an incredible trainer.  He really pays attention to your goals and creates workouts specifically designed to meet those goals.  He is a pleasure to work with. I would definitely  recommend him as a personal trainer!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Susan, Thank you for your recommendation and review. We are very happy to hear that you had great personal training sessions with our trainer Dylan. We take pride of helping members to achieve their fitness goals! It is our pleasure to be part of your fitness journey! Have a great day, Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I highly recommend Jogpaul as a personal trainer. His expertise in fitness is unmatched. Hes incredibly easy to work with, always adapting to my needs and goals. Jogpauls unwavering support and positive attitude have been instrumental in my fitness journey. I couldnt have asked for a better trainer.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Vikk, Thank you for your positive feedback with our personal trainer Jogpaul. He puts his heart to his client and makes sure he helps his clients to achieve their fitness goals! Again, thank you for your 5 star reviews with our personal training service! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I got Jogpaul as my personal trainer and hes exceptional! He gives the best advice ive ever received for fitness and still maintains a good relationship with his clients outside of the workout. His motivating energy left me with results past me would be proud of alongside Jogpaul himself. If you get the chance to choose your PT, I couldnt recommend anyone else more.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shei, Thank you for your review and we are glad that you enjoyed the personal training sessions with Jogpaul. We appreciate the kind words! This totally made our day when we heard about our personal training clients are satisfied and get to their fitness goals! Have a great day, and thanks for the review again! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Dylan is an absolute joy to have as a PT . He s professional, patient, knowledgeable and will make the whole experience for you so much fun . He also pushes you to work hard and will ensure sure that you reach your goals. I owe every inch of success to him , 100% recommend
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hannah, Thank you for your review! This is wonderful to hear that our trainer Dylan has helped you to achieve your fitness goals! We always love to make clients workout plan fun and professional! Enjoy your workout and thanks for your recommendation. Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had an amazing experience with my PT Jogpaul D! Jogpaul is super knowledgeable, motivating, and really pushed me to reach my fitness goals. He personalized my workouts and provided valuable guidance throughout my fitness journey. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a dedicated and supportive trainer!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Baljyot, Thank you for your amazing review! We really appreciate your kind words. Jogpaul is one of our best trainers to train with! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve been training with Jogpaul for almost 2 months now and I can t say enough about how helpful he has been to me. He s helped me find the right balance with work, social and gym life. He s pushed me to understand failure and I ve seen unreal results in such a short space of time. I m excited for what s next and couldn t recommend him enough for anybody considering personal training.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ryan, Thank you for review. This review made our day! Its always great to see our personal training client get their results and see the difference in progress! We are excited to see your next step of your fitness journey and Jogpaul will help you along the way! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Delighted to have Chloe as my PT for the past couple of months - her professionalism along with mountains of expertise on nutrition, goal setting, targeted training methods to even out imbalances and her clarity in explaining proper form/technique has been refreshing. I would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a tailored plan, no matter what your level is! What truly sets Chloe apart is her ability to motivate and inspire. She genuinely cares about her clients goals and aspirations and goes above and beyond to keep me motivated. Her positive attitude, energy, and unwavering support has created an environment where I feel encouraged to push myself even after a long day of work.

Awesome gym for the monthly fee. The PT I ve done with Adam for the past 6 months has really boosted my confidence using the broad range of equipment available (and gyms in general) and given me a lot of new routines I wouldn t have put together on my own and also helped nutrition advice that wraps around my busy schedule to help me with my goals. Highly recommended!

I cant say enough good things about Jogpaul! He is hands down the best personal trainer in the industry. Thanks to his expertise and dedication, Ive not only achieved my fitness goals but also become stronger than I ever thought possible. Jogpauls personalized training programs are second to none. His encouragement and support every step of the way have been instrumental in my fitness journey. Whether youre a beginner or a seasoned fitness enthusiast, Jogpaul tailors his workouts to suit your needs and abilities. I wholeheartedly recommend Jogpaul to everyone looking to improve their fitness and overall well-being. You wont find a more dedicated and knowledgeable trainer than Jogpaul. Thank you, for helping me reach new heights in my fitness journey. You truly are the best!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Varun, It is very nice of your words and review! Helping our personal training client with our training program and nutrition coaching is something that we take pride in, so to hear that its working for you with Jogpaul! Thanks again for your review! Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: My experience with Fitness World Kitsilano has been and continues to be perfect. From the work outs, to the amazing trainers! A special shout out to one of the trainers Chloe. She is extremely professional, motivating, knowledgeable and encouraging. She knows how to push you to the limit in the best way possible with your workouts. Chloe really care and go above and beyond to help you achieve your goals.  Highly recommended! Thank you!

I took some personal training sessions with Ashley here after the recommendation of a friend and, without any exaggeration, she has changed my life for the better and helped set me on my own path to a healthier life. I really connect with Ashleys approach and vibe, as I find most trainers a little too rah-rah and come across a bit fake, so Ashleys kindness, transparency, and easy-going personality are strong motivators to keep it up. And on top of physical results, Im seeing strong mental gains as shes constantly reminding me to not give her ALL the credit, as Im dedicated to my own fitness journey, putting in the work, and making changes. Clearly, I highly recommend trying some sessions with Ashley if she has availability!

Jogpaul is one of the hardest working trainers you re going to come across. He has poured years of blood sweat and tears into perfecting his craft and now he s sharing that experience with the rest of us. Working with Jogpaul is going to push you to places you weren t sure you could go and will help you develop the physique you ve been dreaming of. Trust his process, invest in yourself and enjoy reaping the rewards! You re in good hands with Jogpaul.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Garrett, Thank you for your 5 stars review. We love hearing our clients are thrilled to our personal training sessions. I know Jogpaul works super hard to make our club the bets place to achieve your fitness goals, so Ill sure to pass off your positive feedback to our team. Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Hazel is always so happy and helpful.  She definitely makes my experience s lot easier when going to the gym.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Orla, Thank you for your review. I know Hazel works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so Ill be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, Eve General Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Melissa, a personal trainer there, is honestly the best trainer Ive worked with! She motivates you and makes sure to push you to achieve your goals. She makes sure to teach you a lot about technique and is super friendly and fun to train with! Really recommend working with her!!

Ive been going here for 4+ years and I am really impressed with the effort that the new owners have put in. Theyve brought in several olympic platforms and a variety of benches and resistance machines to diversify the equipment. PT Adam is a fantastic trainer who is friendly, knowledgeable and inspiring. I would definitely recommend this gym.
Great gym! My personal trainer Chloe is very knowledgeable and professional. Im already seeing some improvements thanks to her help and dedication! Would highly recommend.

Needed to find a new gym to go and came across this gym. Very satisfied and had a great experience. One of the employees named Arvi who was very friendly showed me around to settle in and gave me some tips on how to use some machines. Looking forward to come back here again!

name: Fitness World
address: Fitness World, 1214 Howe St, Vancouver, BC V6Z 1R5

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fairly friendly staff, some are more on the reserved side and dont come across as friendly but thats okay. A great selection of equipment spread out over two huge floors. Can be a little busy at times but everyone is pretty respectful. My five star review goes to the trainers, specifically Ryan. During my time training with Ryan hes attentive to my goals and needs and aware of minor adjustments needed to see a change in posture, stance and aesthetics. Highly recommend training with him.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Saleste, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Ryan works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Jordan

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had a great personal training session with Jared J here at Fitness World Howe and Davie. I highly recommend this coach he is super experienced. He knows about nutrition and how to put technique and fun together in a workout session. I was feeling the difference working out with him, his guidance was so much better than group sessions I had with coaches in the past. Another thing I like about my gym is how focused everyone is here when it comes to working out and how nice and friendly the staff is.

I joined this gym last month and I m very happy with my decision. The gym is very nice and has all the equipment and facilities I need. The staff is very polite and helpful, especially Katy who helped me in the hassle free membership process. She was very friendly and professional and answered all my questions. I would recommend this gym to anyone who is looking for a great place to work out.

Shota and Andrew are good personal trainers! I had a couple of sessions with Shota for deadlift. it was great. I also had the chance to learn deadlift with Andrew on Member Appreciation Day. He is also good! The gym is always busy when Im there, but its a nice place!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Taeny, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Shota and Andrew work super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Jordan

detailed_reviews.review_text: Katy was very helpful, professional, courteous and solved my problem effortlessly. I am moving back to California, and needed to cancel my membership. Katy was able to work out a solution that avoided me paying out the rest of my term. Additionally, the gym is spacious and well stocked with every possible machine and weight to effectively exercise every muscle in the body. I am also very impressed with the trainers. I was given an assessment and a free session when I started my membership. This helped me to make great strides towards my fitness goal. Excellent gym, great membership prices, highly recommend and if I am back in Vancouver I will definitely get another membership here!

Love this gym at Downtown so far. There is so much equipment available to start you on your fitness journey. Also, there are classes available which I loved it and there are recovery machines to help you feel better.   It has a friendly and helpful staff, and cleaned constantly.

I had an outstanding experience setting up my new membership. I was helped by a marvellous employee named mathea. She explained my options and benefits in great detail. My purchase felt very secure, definitely recommend going to this location and finding her!!!

Love everything about this gym the staff definitely make you feel welcomed and people in the gym are super friendly. high quality machines and great group classes specially the spin class. Make sure you use the hydromassage after your workout to relax!!

I ve had a few training sessions with Ryan Le. Ryan has been really amazing. He s patient, professional, friendly and a lot of fun to work with. I d definitely recommend having him as a personal trainer.

Downtown location can be very crowded, you are going to stay 1h30 on the gym, but the 1/2 hour is just waiting for equipments. On the other hand the staff is very friendly and helpful, especially Katy from the front desk and the personal trainer Shota.

Been training here with Andrew since I moved downtown over a year ago and I have seen so much progress from his program. I ve never felt so motivated to go to the gym. Also all the staff are awesome!! Love you guys!!!
Great gym! I ve been coming here for years and it keeps getting better. The GM Jordan is especially kind and helpful. Love it here
Good amount of equipment and generally not too busy in non peak times. Friendly and helpful staff such as Katy with a warm smile. Was a member in the 90s and good to be back again.
Great gym downtown Vancouver! Friendly staff who are happy to help and the management team Jared and Jordan are very professional and care about your fitness goals! Amazing overall experience :)

Guys! Please get a trap bar. The gym is great but a trap bar is a must. Itll be used by us constantly, and its an amazing alternative for many exercises. Its a must-have. Please make it happen. And keep up the good work.

I ve been training with my personal trainer  Tarek Shorbagy  at Fitness world for about 1 month & half now and have had such an impactful positive & transformative experience with him. I planned to hire trainer for only one month but now I have 3 sessions/week with Tarek and planning to extend it to one year as I am feeling my whole body feels stronger and better than before, we are having very productive and effective sessions. Tarek is enthusiastic, encouraging, but most importantly knows what he s doing and has helped me greatly in improving my strength and mobility. If you re looking for a trainer, he s who you should go to! Thanks Fitness world for hiring such great trainers and providing amazing facility to workout. Have a great time

First time going to this location and didn t hate it. It was bit crowded but I had a great interaction with Mathea, she was so kind and so welcoming. She even  gave me a few tips on how to reach my fitness goal. Thank you Mathea !
I recommend the gym to anyone who wishes to have a perfect workout. The staff is doing a great job. Amirali was the person who assisted me. He should get a raise.
Best gym in Vancouver! The staff is so friendly and it s a great environment to work out in. The best personal trainers in Vancouver are located here! Guaranteed a great workout
Really well  presented gym, always spotless. Staff super helpful if any issues arise. It is the best gym in downtown

I have been a member at the Fitness World on Howe for 2 years solid right now. I love the convenience of its location the size of the gym and friendly staff. I have also had a personal trainer there the whole 2 years. Kenneth Lee has been my personal trainer and the experience with him has been truly life changing. I was still in a recovery mode from triple k ee surgeries when I first started with Ken.I have now seen heights I never thought I could reached.  I  am very grateful for him as trainer and friend and highly recommend his services for anybody looking to make that physical change in their life.

Its a good gym and has nearly every piece of equipment you would need. I think most of the people giving it a bad review are looking for a spa, not a gym. We come here to work out, not to relax and be pampered. The price is good. The location is good. And 99 percent of the time everything is functional. The location is older, so it is what it is. If you want a brand new sparkling gym youll have to go elsewhere and pay much more. And to one of the other reviewers mentioning guys downstairs grunting or something along those lines: Thats what PEOPLE do (involuntarily) when they exert themselves past their normal limits. You should try it some time. You might see some progress.
Very clean gym, extremely friendly and welcoming staff! Is 2 floors, has everything you need AND has a rooftop space to train outdoors! This gym is a hidden gem downtown!

15 months ago I hired Kenneth Lee as my personal trainer. It has been a great decision. Ken knows his stuff, is a gentleman and a good person. He cares about his clients and has also become a good friend. Ken adjusts his style to the needs of his clients depending on their condition, age, needs, and moods. I have never had a workout that I didn t like. I turned 60 earlier this month, and have never been stronger in my life.  If you need a trainer, hire Kennth Lee. Then in the future you can pat yourself on the back for making such a great decision too!
Had a great experience here, best Fitness World in Van! I was confused about the different memberships but the person at the front desk was really helpful. I think their name was Mathea

name: Fitness World
address: Fitness World, 1185 W Georgia St #200, Vancouver, BC V6E 4E6

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently visited the  fitness world (Georgia) gym and had the pleasure of encountering an outstanding desk person ( Ivana) who truly made my experience remarkable. From the moment I walked in, she greeted me with a warm and friendly smile, instantly making me feel welcome. her exceptional customer service skills was evident as she patiently answered all my questions and provided me with a thorough tour of the gym facilities. she took the time to understand my fitness goals and offered valuable insights on various workout routines and classes that would best suit my needs. What impressed me the most was their genuine enthusiasm for helping others. Furthermore, the desk person displayed excellent knowledge of the gyms amenities, classes, and membership options. She went above and beyond to ensure I had all the information I needed to make an informed decision about becoming a member. I can confidently say that this desk person is an asset to the gym and plays a significant role in creating a positive and motivating environment for all members. I highly recommend visiting the gym and experiencing their exceptional service firsthand. Mahsa

Best gym ever! Friendly staff with a great manager, feels like you re part of the most vibrant family! Annasthesia, makes sure all members having great time and makes your experience memorable and unique! she s fun, supportive and very caring! The gym is clean and all facility is new. You ll go to this gym once, you don t want to be anywhere else!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ella, Thank you for your feedback! I am glad to hear that your experience at Fitness World Georgia is memorable! See you during your next workout! Thanks, Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is the best gym I have ever been to!! I ve been in so many gyms throughout my life and this one is by FAR the cleanest, most organized, and motivating gym. The staff are the best part though, they are amazing!!! I love the general manager here, Annastasija. Huge shout out to her! I ve found my forever gym :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Bella, This review made our day! It s always great to hear how we re able to support our members in accomplishing their goals, and helping them in their fitness journey! A clean and organized space is something that we take pride in, so to hear that it s working for you is especially rewarding. Have a great day, and thanks for the review! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym! Lots of space, lots of equipment and never overly busy! Very good value for money as well!
Ivana at Fitness World in West Georgia is amazing! The facility is top-notch, and her dedication to helping members achieve their fitness goals is exceptional. Its a 5-star experience all the way.

Best gym!!! So many squat racks and unreal machines, even have a Nordic curl one which is AMAZING!! Most fun and welcoming environment by far I ve ever experienced, this will always be my favourite place for  working out, and has been the best place I ve gone in the last 3 years:), and I m a personal trainer, so that says a lot for me!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Mila, Thank you for your review! I am glad to hear that you are enjoying the new equipment in the facility :) Keep up the hard work with your fitness program :) We will see you around the gym! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: A very nice facility that is always busy! Has most of the equipment you ll need. I was set up with a personal trainer, Lorena, and couldn t ask for a better teacher. I was too shy to get a trainer before, but she s helped me surpass so many goals and has made a positive impact on my gym experience. Highly recommend if you re looking for a dedicated and personable trainer / gym.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sir, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Lorena works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: The staff are nothing short of amazing. The staff are always ready to help you and answer all the questions you have. They are always so friendly and welcoming as soon as you step foot in the door. If you need a safe place to workout fitness world is definitely the way to go!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Matysse, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know that our staff works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love this gym, the staff has always been kind and friendly! Specially Marcos who helped me since day one. A lot of good equipments and a comfortable space to workout overall. Very nice vibes and never had problems with payment

I love working out and I enjoy it a lot in this place! It s well-equipped, the environment is good and the staff is always helpful and friendly, especially Ivana who is always punctual, responsible, friendly and always has a smile on her face!! I love her vibe and enthusiasm, its really contagious! Love this place,  my happy place    !!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Diana, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Ivana works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym and great staff, I ve recently embarked on a weight loss journey trying to loose 100 pounds and i really feel like the staff have set me up to succeed! Annastasija the general manager walked me through the whole gym and made me feel so motivated! She really made me feel like I wasn t alone in this journey and that meant a lot !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alec, This review made our day! It s always great to hear how we re able to support our members in accomplishing their goals, and helping them in their fitness journey! Providing support to our members fitness journey is something that we take pride in! Keep up the hard work and motivation :) Have a great day, and thanks for the review! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fitness World Georgia Street location I have been a client of Daniel David for over one year working out of this location.  I find the gym and equipment provides a full body training experience.  Daniel has been an inspiring trainer and his commitment to his clients is to achieve the best possible results safely.  I highly recommend this elite trainer and the facility.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Philip, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Daniel works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fitness World is a great gym with excellent staff and top-notch equipment. From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the welcoming and helpful attitude of the staff. Fred, the manager, who was especially helpful as he assisted me in signing up for my membership and pairing me with the perfect fitness trainer. I then was introduced to Annastasija, who has been nothing but amazing to work with. She designed a workout plan that was tailored to my fitness goals and made me look better than I have in months. Her expertise and knowledge was par none the best I have received compared to my past trainers. One thing that stands out about this location is the cleanliness of the gym. The equipment is always in good condition and maintained properly, which is a rarity in most other gyms. I never have to worry about finding dirty machines or broken equipment, which can be frustrating in other places. Overall, I highly recommend this location to anyone looking for a gym that is near a skytrain and overall friendly staff and wanting to hit their fitness goals.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Phillip, This review made our day! It s always great to hear how we re able to support our members in accomplishing their goals, and helping them in their fitness journey! Cleanliness is something that we take pride in, so to hear that it s working for you is especially rewarding. Have a great day, and thanks for the review! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym experience so far. The facility is amazing, and the staff is even better especially my personal trainer Fred. He is professional yet kind, patient and understanding. His encouragement has given me confidence I needed, and the interesting workouts hes created have allowed me to improve my core strength and stability. I would recommend anyone who would like to improve their fitness to work with Fred.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sneh, This review made our day! It s always great to hear how we re able to support our members in accomplishing their goals, and helping them in their fitness journey! Personal Training is something that we take pride in, so to hear that Freds program is working for you is especially rewarding. Have a great day, and thanks for the review! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love this gym! I always feel so comfortable and welcomed by the awesome staff! I like to come in the morning, so Ivana is always there to welcome me with a friendly smile!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sofia, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Ivana works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: I found the gym pretty affordable the installations are amazing and theres a lot of machines for everything. Plus the massage seats which helps a lot for recovering also the front desk is really helpful specially Marcos he is so open and engaging and give you all the information you need to start the journey! Cheers :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi __first name__, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I am glad to heat that you are enjoying the hydro massage for recovery!
