I know Marcos works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: could not be happier with the service here. staff is absolutely excellent, very knowledgeable and definitely made us feel comfortable. my girlfriend has a long list of health conditions that makes it difficult for us to choose a gym that fits our preference but after coming here, the options that are provided were much better than the other gyms weve been to. its quite spacious, facilities are clean and well put together, would definitely recommend this to anyone! thank you fred, ella, and annastasjia!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Matthew, Thank you for your review. I am glad to hear the the Georgia team is able to help both yourself and your girlfriend with a fun inclusive space to workout in and achieve your fitness goals. See you both around the club! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: I m a member at Fitness World on Georgia street, where I work out with a personal trainer by the name of Daniel David. It is truly amazing what a difference it makes having an elite trainer like Daniel who is very knowledgable highly skilled and enthusiastic. I would highly recommend him.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Runie, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Daniel David works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: We work out in weekday mornings at the Bute street location. Ivana is always welcoming and friendly. Really enjoy the facility and staff
Number #1 gym! The new General Manager Graham, has cleared all my questions and concerns. Very kind and welcoming!!

Fred and Annastaija at the fitness center were outstanding. They welcomed me warmly, provided excellent guidance and support throughout my workout, and helped me develop a personalized fitness plan. Their knowledge and expertise were evident, and I highly recommend this fitness center
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Jason, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Fred works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: I got the three day pass before switching my gym to this location. It was a great space but Ella and her customer service made it even better! She was very friendly and was more than willing to help me with my questions and was even kind enough to show me around the gym!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hossein, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know Ella works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Money spent here makes so much sense vs. Equinox. All personal trainers are solid and responsible. Highly recommend Fred who will make each of your movement to the point and effective, and most importantly take care of you.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Vivian, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! I know our Fitness Manager, Fred, works super hard to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals, so I ll be sure to pass off your positive feedback to them. Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Wow I gotta give it to the management staff here! Fred and Annastasija were amazing, super approachable and welcoming. Gave me a recommendation to try the dotfit vanilla and oh my god it was amazing! Will be recommending this club to my friends and family. Keep up the good work!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alex, We appreciate the kind words! We love hearing from our members, especially when we re able to make a positive difference in your fitness journey! As a management team, Fred and I strive to make our club the best place to achieve your fitness goals! Thanks again, see you in the club soon! Annastasija

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fitness World is the best gym I have ever been to, there are sufficient machines for every exercise in the gym and you don t have to wait for anything.
